column4: hello, was wondering if there was a way to view images in a folder in modified order instead of filename order. when viewing images off Nautilus, "Eye of Gnome" comes up and regardless of my settings always goes through the settings in filename alphabetical order.
just right click the Nautilus window and arrange by Modification Date.
when i do that it modifies the order of the items in Nautilus
but when i bring up Eye Of Gnome it goes to alphabetical...
